content.prompt: In the second and third sentences of the second paragraph, the author implies which of the following about the differences between men and women?

choices.label: Differences between men and women exist but are related only to the jobs people choose.
Differences between men and women exist but are limited only to particular attributes.
Women are more likely to be pacifists than men are.
Men are more likely to seek adventure than women are.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify and describe the overarching thesis of an argument, and any indication it provides of the argument's structure.
